### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
Looks like it doesn't fix the issue: https://bitcoinbuilds.org/logs/251e6256-d6a5-455e-aed8-e39338fd1882.log (somehow still compiles with USE_DBUS)
Kinda agree with @fanquake that fixing the pkg-config path for depends builds should be done.\n\nThough this quick fix does also make sense on its own.
